UserCode.pets

Class Pet

  • java.lang.Object
    • Framework.DisplayObject
      • UserCode.pets.Pet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisplayObject, IPet
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bubble, Bubbler, JavaFish, OrangeFish, Piranha, Seahorse, Urchin

    public abstract class Pet
extends DisplayObject
implements IPet
    Pet is the parent class of all fish classes, it must contain all the common characteristics (fields, methods) required by it's fish children to perform their required functionality.
    Version:
    09/11/2018
    Author:
    Reid Giles

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract void movement()
      METHOD: Controls swim behaviour of children, moves the fish back and forth along the x axis, bouncing of walls and always facing the direction it is moving.

    • Method Detail

      • movement

        protected abstract void movement()
        METHOD: Controls swim behaviour of children, moves the fish back and forth along the x axis, bouncing of walls and always facing the direction it is moving. Also oscilates the fish along the x axis creating a wave like motion.

      • rotate

        protected void rotate(double dx,
                      double dy)
        METHOD: Manipulates the x,y and z values of the caller, rotating them. Core rotation method.
        Parameters:
        dx - How far to rotate on the x axis
        dy - How far to rotate on the y axis

      • rotate

        protected void rotate(double dx,
                      double dy,
                      double dz)
        METHOD: Manipulates the x,y and z values of the caller, rotating them. Core rotation method.
        Parameters:
        dx - How far to rotate on the x axis
        dy - How far to rotate on the y axis
        dz - How far to rotate on the z axis

      • translate

        protected void translate(double dx,
                         double dy)
        METHOD: Manipulates the x,y and z position values of the caller, moving them across the aquarium. Core movement method.
        Parameters:
        dx - How far to move along the x axis
        dy - How far to move along the y axis

      • translate

        protected void translate(double dx,
                         double dy,
                         double dz)
        METHOD: Manipulates the x and y values of the caller, moving them across the aquarium. Core movement method.
        Parameters:
        dx - How far to move along the x axis
        dy - How far to move along the y axis
        dz - How far to move along the z axis
